biotools.summary: Scalable Distance-based Phylogenetic Placement with or without Alignments | distance based phylogenetic placement | APPLES stands for Accurate Phylogenetic Placement with LEast Squares and addresses the problem of phylogenetic placement of DNA and protein sequences into an already existing reference tree. APPLES is a command-line tool and it can run on Linux, Mac OSX, and Windows
